00019 
00020 rlModbus::rlModbus(long max_telegram_length, int _mode, char end_delimitor)
00021 {
00022   if(max_telegram_length < 256) max_telegram_length = 256;
00023   tel = new unsigned char[max_telegram_length];
00024   maxtel = max_telegram_length;
00025   mode = _mode;
00026   delimitor = end_delimitor;
00027   s = NULL;
00028   tty = NULL;
00029   autoreconnectSocket = 1;
00030 }
00031 
00032 rlModbus::~rlModbus()
00033 {
00034   if(tel != NULL) delete [] tel;
00035 }
00036 
00037 int rlModbus::data2int(const unsigned char *data)
00038 {
00039   return (data[0]*256)+data[1];
00040 }
00041 
00042 int rlModbus::int2data(int val, unsigned char *data)
00043 {
00044   data[0] = (unsigned char) val / 256;
00045   data[1] = (unsigned char) val & 0x0ff;
00046   return 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 int rlModbus::intsize()
00050 {
00051   return 2;
00052 }
00053 
00054 int rlModbus::write(int slave, int function, const unsigned char *data, int datalen, int *transactionID)
00055 {
00056   int len,i;
00057 
00058   if(slave < 0 || slave > 255) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00059   len = 0;
00060   if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00061   {
00062     tel[len++] = ':';
00063     sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X", slave);          len += 2;
00064     sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X", function);       len += 2;
00065     for(i=0; i<datalen; i++)
00066     {
00067       sprintf((char *) &tel[len], "%02X",(int) data[i]); len += 2;
00068       if((len+4) > maxtel) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00069     }
00070     insertLRC(len);                                     len += 2;
00071     tel[len++] = 0x0d;
00072     if(delimitor == 0x0a) tel[len++] = 0x0a;
00073   }
00074   else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00075   {
00076     if(s != NULL)
00077     {
00078       if(transactionID == NULL)
00079       {
00080         tel[len++] = 0;       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID. Not important. Usually zero when making a request, the server will copy them faithfully into the response.
00081         tel[len++] = 0;
00082       }
00083       else
00084       {
00085         tel[len++] = ((*transactionID) & 0xFF00) / 256;         // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID.
00086         tel[len++] = (*transactionID) & 0xFF;
00087       }
00088       tel[len++] = 0;         // bytes 2,3 Protocol number. Must be zero.
00089       tel[len++] = 0;
00090       tel[len++] = 0;         // byte 4 Length (upper byte). Since all requests will be less than 256 bytes in length (!), this will always be zero.
00091       tel[len++] = 2+datalen; // byte 5 Length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00092     }
00093     tel[len++] = (unsigned char) slave;
00094     tel[len++] = (unsigned char) function;
00095     for(i=0; i<datalen; i++)
00096     {
00097       tel[len++] = data[i];
00098       if((len+2) > maxtel) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00099     }
00100     insertCRC(len);                                     len += 2;
00101   }
00102   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00103 
00104   if(s != NULL)
00105   {
00106     if(s->isConnected() == 0)
00107     {
00108       if(autoreconnectSocket) s->connect();
00109       if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00110     }
00111     if(s->write(tel,len-2) < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR; // don't send LRC or CRC
00112   }
00113   else if(tty != NULL)
00114   {
00115     if(tty->writeBlock(tel,len) < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00116   }
00117   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00118   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00119 }
00120 
00121 int rlModbus::request(int slave, int function, int start_adr, int num_register)
00122 {
00123   unsigned char data[4];
00124 
00125   data[0] = (unsigned char) ( start_adr / 256 );
00126   data[1] = (unsigned char) ( start_adr & 0x0ff );
00127   data[2] = (unsigned char) ( num_register / 256 ); 
00128   data[3] = (unsigned char) ( num_register & 0x0ff );
00129   return write(slave, function, data, 4);
00130 }
00131 
00132 int rlModbus::response(int *slave, int *function, unsigned char *data, int timeout)
00133 {
00134   unsigned char *telptr;
00135   int ret,len,byte_count,idata,i,itel,val;
00136 
00137   len = 0;
00138   if(mode != MODBUS_ASCII && mode != MODBUS_RTU) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00139   if(s != NULL)
00140   {
00141     if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00142     if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00143     {
00144       if(s->read((char *) tel, 6, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00145       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID faithfully copied from the request message
00146       // bytes 2,3 Protocol number always zero
00147       // byte 4 Response length (upper byte) Always zero
00148       // byte 5 Response length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00149       // Here comes the normal Modus telegram
00150       if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00151       *slave     = tel[0];
00152       *function  = tel[1];
00153       switch(*function)
00154       {
00155         case ReadCoilStatus:
00156         case ReadInputStatus:
00157         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00158         case ReadInputRegisters:
00159         case FetchCommEventLog:
00160         case ReportSlaveID:
00161         case ReadGeneralReference:
00162         case WriteGeneralReference:
00163         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00164           if(s->read((char *) tel, 1, timeout) <= 0)            return MODBUS_ERROR;
00165           byte_count = tel[0];
00166           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00167           return byte_count;
00168         case ForceSingleCoil:
00169         case PresetSingleRegister:
00170         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00171         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00172         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00173           byte_count = 4;
00174           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00175           return byte_count;
00176         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00177           byte_count = 1;
00178           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00179           return byte_count;
00180         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00181           byte_count = 6;
00182           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00183           return byte_count;
00184         case ReadFifoQueue:
00185           if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0)            return MODBUS_ERROR;
00186           byte_count = tel[0]*256 + tel[1];
00187           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)  return MODBUS_ERROR;
00188           return byte_count;
00189         default:
00190           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00191       }
00192       byte_count = tel[2];
00193       if(s->read((char *) &tel[3], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00194       len = 3;
00195       for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00196       {
00197         data[idata] = buf2int_rtu(&tel[len]); len += 2;
00198       }
00199       data[idata] = 0x0ff;
00200     }
00201   }
00202   else if(tty != NULL)
00203   {
00204     if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00205     {
00206       //printf("modbus ascii\n");
00207       for(i=0; i<maxtel; i++)
00208       {
00209         ret = tty->select(timeout);
00210         if(ret == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00211         //printf("readChar\n");
00212         itel = tty->readChar();
00213         if(itel < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00214         tel[i] = (unsigned char) itel;
00215         if(tel[i] == 0x0d && delimitor != 0x0a) break;
00216         if(tel[i] == 0x0a)                      break;
00217       }
00218       tel[i] = '\0';
00219       telptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((const char *) tel,':');
00220       if(telptr == NULL) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00221       len++;
00222       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",slave);       len += 2;
00223       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",function);    len += 2;
00224       switch(*function)
00225       {
00226         case ReadCoilStatus:
00227         case ReadInputStatus:
00228         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00229         case ReadInputRegisters:
00230         case FetchCommEventLog:
00231         case ReportSlaveID:
00232         case ReadGeneralReference:
00233         case WriteGeneralReference:
00234         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00235           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);    len += 2;
00236           for(idata=0; idata<byte_count; idata++)
00237           {
00238             sscanf((const char *) &telptr[len], "%02X", &val); len += 2;
00239             data[idata] = val;
00240           }
00241           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00242           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00243           return byte_count;
00244         case ForceSingleCoil:
00245         case PresetSingleRegister:
00246         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00247         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00248         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00249           byte_count = 8;
00250           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00251           {
00252             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00253           }
00254           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00255           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00256           return byte_count;
00257         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00258           byte_count = 2;
00259           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00260           {
00261             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00262           }
00263           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00264           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00265           return byte_count;
00266         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00267           byte_count = 12;
00268           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00269           {
00270             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00271           }
00272           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00273           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00274           return byte_count;
00275         case ReadFifoQueue:
00276           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%04X",&byte_count); len += 4;
00277           for(idata=0; idata<(byte_count/2); idata++)
00278           {
00279             data[idata] = buf2int_ascii(&telptr[len]);     len += 2;
00280           }
00281           data[idata] = 0x0ff; // terminator, this data can't come over modbus
00282           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00283           return byte_count;
00284           break;
00285         default:
00286           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00287       }
00288     }
00289     else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00290     {
00291       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00292       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00293       if(tty->readBlock(tel, 2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00294       *slave     = tel[len++];
00295       *function  = tel[len++];
00296       switch(*function)
00297       {
00298         case ReadCoilStatus:
00299         case ReadInputStatus:
00300         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00301         case ReadInputRegisters:
00302         case FetchCommEventLog:
00303         case ReportSlaveID:
00304         case ReadGeneralReference:
00305         case WriteGeneralReference:
00306         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00307           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00308           if(tty->readBlock(&tel[len], 1) <= 0)       return MODBUS_ERROR;
00309           byte_count = tel[len++];
00310           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00311           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00312           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00313           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00314           return byte_count;
00315         case ForceSingleCoil:
00316         case PresetSingleRegister:
00317         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00318         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00319         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00320           byte_count = 4;
00321           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00322           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00323           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00324           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00325           return byte_count;
00326         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00327           byte_count = 1;
00328           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00329           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00330           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00331           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00332           return byte_count;
00333         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00334           byte_count = 6;
00335           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00336           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00337           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00338           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00339           return byte_count;
00340         case ReadFifoQueue:
00341           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00342           if(tty->readBlock(&tel[len], 2) <= 0)       return MODBUS_ERROR;
00343           byte_count = tel[len]*256 + tel[len+1]; len += 2;
00344           if(tty->select(timeout) == 0)               return MODBUS_ERROR;
00345           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00346           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count + 2;
00347           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                      return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00348           return byte_count;
00349         default:
00350           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00351       }
00352     }
00353   }
00354   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00355   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00356 }
00357 
00358 int rlModbus::readRequest(int *slave, int *function, unsigned char *data, int timeout, int *transactionID)
00359 {
00360   unsigned char *telptr;
00361   int ret,len,byte_count,i,itel,val;
00362 
00363   len = 0;
00364   if(mode != MODBUS_ASCII && mode != MODBUS_RTU) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00365   if(s != NULL)
00366   {
00367     if(s->isConnected() == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00368     if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00369     {
00370       if(s->read((char *) tel, 6, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00371       if(transactionID != NULL) *transactionID = tel[0] * 256 + tel[1]; // return transactionID
00372       // bytes 0,1 Transaction ID faithfully copied from the request message
00373       // bytes 2,3 Protocol number always zero
00374       // byte 4 Response length (upper byte) Always zero
00375       // byte 5 Response length (lower byte). Equal to the number of bytes which follow
00376       // Here comes the normal Modus telegram
00377       if(s->read((char *) tel, 2, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00378       *slave     = tel[0];
00379       *function  = tel[1];
00380       switch(*function)
00381       {
00382         case ReadCoilStatus:
00383         case ReadInputStatus:
00384         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00385         case ReadInputRegisters:
00386         case ForceSingleCoil:
00387         case PresetSingleRegister:
00388           if(s->read((char *) data, 4, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00389           return 4;
00390         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00391         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00392         case FetchCommEventLog:
00393         case ReportSlaveID:
00394           return 0;
00395         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00396         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00397           if(s->read((char *) data, 5, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00398           byte_count = data[4];
00399           if(s->read((char *) &data[4], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00400           return 4+byte_count;
00401         case ReadGeneralReference:
00402         case WriteGeneralReference:
00403           if(s->read((char *) data, 1, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00404           byte_count = data[0];
00405           if(s->read((char *) data, byte_count, timeout) <= 0)     return MODBUS_ERROR;
00406           return byte_count;
00407         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00408           if(s->read((char *) data, 6, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00409           return 6;
00410         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00411           if(s->read((char *) data, 9, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00412           byte_count = data[8];
00413           if(s->read((char *) &data[8], byte_count, timeout) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00414           return 8+byte_count;
00415         case ReadFifoQueue:
00416           if(s->read((char *) data, 2, timeout) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00417           return 2;
00418         default:
00419           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00420       }
00421     }
00422   }
00423   else if(tty != NULL)
00424   {
00425     if(mode == MODBUS_ASCII)
00426     {
00427       //printf("modbus ascii\n");
00428       for(i=0; i<maxtel; i++)
00429       {
00430         ret = tty->select(timeout);
00431         if(ret == 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00432         //printf("readChar\n");
00433         itel = tty->readChar();
00434         if(itel < 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00435         tel[i] = (unsigned char) itel;
00436         if(tel[i] == 0x0d && delimitor != 0x0a) break;
00437         if(tel[i] == 0x0a)                      break;
00438       }
00439       tel[i] = '\0';
00440       telptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((const char *) tel,':');
00441       if(telptr == NULL) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00442       len++;
00443       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",slave);       len += 2;
00444       sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",function);    len += 2;
00445       switch(*function)
00446       {
00447         case ReadCoilStatus:
00448         case ReadInputStatus:
00449         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00450         case ReadInputRegisters:
00451         case ForceSingleCoil:
00452         case PresetSingleRegister:
00453           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00454           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00455           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00456           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00457           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00458           return 4;
00459         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00460         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00461         case FetchCommEventLog:
00462         case ReportSlaveID:
00463           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00464           return 0;
00465         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00466         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00467           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00468           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00469           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00470           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00471           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                         len += 2;
00472           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00473           {
00474             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4+i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00475           }
00476           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00477           return 4+byte_count;
00478         case ReadGeneralReference:
00479         case WriteGeneralReference:
00480           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                           len += 2;
00481           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00482           {
00483             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00484           }
00485           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00486           return byte_count;
00487         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00488           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00489           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00490           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00491           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00492           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00493           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[5] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00494           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00495           return 6;
00496         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00497           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00498           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00499           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[2] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00500           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[3] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00501           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[4] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00502           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[5] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00503           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[6] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00504           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[7] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00505           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&byte_count);                         len += 2;
00506           for(i=0; i<byte_count; i++)
00507           {
00508             sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[8+i] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00509           }
00510           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00511           return 8+byte_count;
00512         case ReadFifoQueue:
00513           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[0] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00514           sscanf((char *) &telptr[len],"%02X",&val); data[1] = (unsigned char) val; len += 2;
00515           if(LRCerror(len) == 1) return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00516           return 2;
00517         default:
00518           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00519       }
00520     }
00521     else if(mode == MODBUS_RTU)
00522     {
00523       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00524       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00525       if(tty->readBlock(tel, 2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00526       *slave     = tel[len++];
00527       *function  = tel[len++];
00528       ret = tty->select(timeout);
00529       if(ret == 0)                    return MODBUS_ERROR;
00530       switch(*function)
00531       {
00532         case ReadCoilStatus:
00533         case ReadInputStatus:
00534         case ReadHoldingRegisters:
00535         case ReadInputRegisters:
00536         case ForceSingleCoil:
00537         case PresetSingleRegister:
00538           if(tty->readBlock(data, 4+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00539           memcpy(&tel[len],data,4+2); len += 4+2;
00540           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00541           return 4;
00542         case ReadExceptionStatus:
00543         case FetchCommEventCtr:
00544         case FetchCommEventLog:
00545         case ReportSlaveID:
00546           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00547           return 0;
00548         case ForceMultipleCoils:
00549         case PresetMultipleRegs:
00550           if(tty->readBlock(data, 5) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00551           memcpy(&tel[len],data,5); len += 5;
00552           byte_count = data[4];
00553           if(tty->readBlock(&data[4], byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00554           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00555           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00556           return 4+byte_count;
00557         case ReadGeneralReference:
00558         case WriteGeneralReference:
00559           if(tty->readBlock(data, 1) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00560           memcpy(&tel[len],data,1); len++;
00561           byte_count = data[0];
00562           if(tty->readBlock(data, byte_count+2) <= 0)     return MODBUS_ERROR;
00563           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00564           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00565           return byte_count;
00566         case MaskWrite4XRegisters:
00567           if(tty->readBlock(data, 6+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00568           memcpy(&tel[len],data,6+2); len += 6+2;
00569           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00570           return 6;
00571         case ReadWrite4XRegisters:
00572           if(tty->readBlock(data, 9) <= 0)                return MODBUS_ERROR;
00573           memcpy(&tel[len],data,9); len += 9;
00574           byte_count = data[8];
00575           if(tty->readBlock(&data[8], byte_count+2) <= 0) return MODBUS_ERROR;
00576           memcpy(&tel[len],data,byte_count+2); len += byte_count+2;
00577           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00578           return 8+byte_count;
00579         case ReadFifoQueue:
00580           if(tty->readBlock(data, 2+2) <= 0)              return MODBUS_ERROR;
00581           memcpy(&tel[len],data,2+2); len += 2+2;
00582           if(CRCerror(len) == 1)                          return MODBUS_CHECKSUM_ERROR;
00583           return 2;
00584         default:
00585           return MODBUS_ERROR;
00586       }
00587     }
00588   }
00589   else return MODBUS_ERROR;
00590   return MODBUS_SUCCESS;
00591 }
00592 
00593 void rlModbus::registerSocket(rlSocket *socket)
00594 {
00595   tty = NULL;
00596   s = socket;
00597 }
00598 
00599 void rlModbus::registerSerial(rlSerial *serial)
00600 {
00601   s = NULL;
00602   tty = serial;
00603 }

00605 int rlModbus::buf2int_rtu(unsigned char *buf)
00606 {
00607   return (buf[0]*256 + buf[1]);
00608 }
00609 
00610 void rlModbus::int2buf_rtu(int i, unsigned char *buf)
00611 {
00612   int high, low;
00613 
00614   high = i / 256;
00615   low  = i & 0x0ff;
00616   buf[0] = (unsigned char) high;
00617   buf[1] = (unsigned char) low;
00618 }
00619 
00620 int rlModbus::buf2int_ascii(unsigned char *buf)
00621 {
00622   int val;
00623 
00624   sscanf((char *) buf,"%04X",&val);
00625   return val;
00626 }
00627 
00628 void rlModbus::int2buf_ascii(int i, unsigned char *buf)
00629 {
00630   sprintf((char *) buf,"%04X",i);
00631 }
00632 
00633 void rlModbus::insertLRC(int len)
00634 {
00635   unsigned char lrc;
00636   int i,high,low,val;
00637 
00638   if(len < 0) return;
00639   lrc = 0;
00640   for(i=1; i<len; i+=2) // exclude starting ':' and trailing <CR><LF>
00641   {
00642     sscanf((const char *) &tel[i],   "%1X", &high);
00643     sscanf((const char *) &tel[i+1], "%1X", &low);
00644     val = high*16 + low;
00645     lrc += val;
00646   }
00647   lrc = ((unsigned char)(-((char) lrc)));
00648   sprintf((char *) &tel[len],"%02X",(unsigned int) lrc);
00649 }
00650 
00651 int rlModbus::LRCerror(int len)
00652 {
00653   unsigned char *cptr;
00654   unsigned char lrc;
00655   int i,high,low,val;
00656 
00657   if(len < 0) return 1;
00658   tel[maxtel-1] = '\0';
00659   cptr = (unsigned char *) strchr((char *)tel,':');
00660   if(cptr == NULL) return 1;
00661   cptr++;
00662   lrc = 0;
00663   for(i=1; i<len+2; i+=2) // exclude starting ':' and trailing <CR><LF>
00664   {                       // len is without lrc -> len+2
00665     sscanf((const char *) cptr++, "%1X", &high);
00666     sscanf((const char *) cptr++, "%1X", &low);
00667     val = high*16 + low;
00668     lrc += val;
00669   }
00670   if(lrc == 0) return 0; // lrc ok
00671   return 1;              // lrc error
00672 }
00673

00735 
00736 void rlModbus::insertCRC(int len)
00737 {
00738   unsigned char crc_high, crc_low;
00739   unsigned index;
00740   int i;
00741 
00742   if(len < 0) return;
00743   crc_high = crc_low = 0xff;
00744   for(i=0; i<len; i++)
00745   {
00746     index = crc_low ^ tel[i];
00747     crc_low  = crc_high ^ array_crc_low[index];
00748     crc_high = array_crc_high[index];
00749   }
00750   tel[len]   = crc_low;
00751   tel[len+1] = crc_high;
00752 }
00753 
00754 int rlModbus::CRCerror(int len)
00755 {
00756   unsigned char crc_high, crc_low;
00757   unsigned index;
00758   int i;
00759 
00760   if(len < 2) return 1;
00761   crc_high = crc_low = 0xff;
00762   for(i=0; i<len-2; i++)
00763   {
00764     index = crc_low ^ tel[i];
00765     crc_low  = crc_high ^ array_crc_low[index];
00766     crc_high = array_crc_high[index];
00767   }
00768   if(crc_low  != tel[len-2]) return 1;
00769   if(crc_high != tel[len-1]) return 1;
00770   return 0;
00771 }
